QA.question: How to start the test?
QA.answer: Click on the "Start Test" button, select the desired category, and follow the instructions.

QA.question: How long will it take to complete the test?
QA.answer: The duration depends on the number of questions. It usually takes between 5 and 15 minutes.

QA.question: Can I skip a question?
QA.answer: Yes, you can skip a question by clicking the "Skip" button (if this feature is available).

QA.question: Can I save the test and continue later?
QA.answer: Yes, you can save your progress and continue by accessing the "My Tests" section.

QA.question: How can I find out the correct answers?
QA.answer: After completing the test, you will see your results and the correct answers (if enabled in the test settings).

QA.question: Do you have tests on topics like [e.g., history]?
QA.answer: Yes, our catalog includes tests on history and many other topics. Select the "History" category in the menu.

QA.question: How do I create my own test?
QA.answer: Go to the "Create Test" section, add a title, description, questions, and answer options.

QA.question: Can I make my test private?
QA.answer: Yes, you can set access permissions to make your test available only to specific users.

QA.question: What types of questions are supported?
QA.answer: You can add multiple-choice questions, text-based questions, matching questions, or even file uploads.

QA.question: Can I add an image or video to a test?
QA.answer: Yes, you can attach images or video links to each question.

QA.question: How do I share a test with others?
QA.answer: Once the test is created, you will receive a unique link to share with others.

QA.question: Is it possible to analyze test results?
QA.answer: Yes, we provide statistics for each question as well as an overall analysis of the results.

QA.question: Is this app free?
QA.answer: Yes, basic features are available for free. Additional features can be unlocked via subscription.

QA.question: How do I sign up?
QA.answer: Click "Sign Up" on the main page and follow the instructions. You can also log in via social networks.

QA.question: I forgot my password, what should I do?
QA.answer: Click "Forgot Password?" on the login page and follow the instructions to reset it.

QA.question: Do you have a mobile app?
QA.answer: Yes, our app is available for iOS and Android. You can download it from the App Store or Google Play.

QA.question: How can I contact support?
QA.answer: Write to us through the "Support" section in the app or email us at [support@example.com].
